product_description: HIGH-QUALITY BUILT: This sturdy dual monitor stand is engineered using highly durable steel. It comes with a heavy-duty adjustable C clamp to help you to position your screen at a more ergonomic viewing angle. SMOOTH ROTATION & POSITIONING: This wide monitor stand gives you the ability to adjust your screen to a desired height by offering a full range of effortless motion. The monitor stand’s smooth 360-degree rotation makes it easy to switch between vertical and horizontal screen positions for your comfort and convenience HEIGHT ADJUSTABLE ARM MOUNT: Along with a wide range of motion, the adjustable arm offers smooth screen tilt and height adjustment that can be adjusted from -15 to +85 degrees. By altering the height and angle of your screen, you can alleviate back, neck, and eye discomfort INTEGRATED CABLE MANAGEMENT: This double monitor stand features detachable VESA plates with 100-by-100-mm backside mounting holes for a simple setup and clean appearance. product_description: Works hard. Looks good. Level up your productivity. The Lenovo’s L22i-40 Monitor is designed to help you get more work done while also elevating your entertainment experience. Experience a boost in productivity on the large yet contemporary, 21.50-inch inch screen. Work documents and movies for entertainment will all look crystal-clear on the display’s FHD (1920 x 1080) resolution. Get a wider view of those large excel sheets with the 3-side NearEdgeless panel design. Enjoy cinematic movies and videos with your friends without having to cram in close, thanks to the wide-viewing angles of the VA panel, which produces deep, inky blacks for an even richer movie viewing experience. Its 99%sRGB color space coverage makes color-critical tasks a breeze. Support for AMD Freesync1 and a rapid 75Hz refresh rate ensures that all your games run completely stutter-free and smoothly. Connecting your work or personal computers to the Lenovo L22e-40 is easy using its 1 x HDMI 1.4 and 1 x VGA input ports. Natural Low Blue Light technology eliminates harmful blue light without color distortion, so you don’t strain your eyes while working. Your desk setup will look clean and contemporary with the monitor’s 6.9 mm slim head design and cloud grey color. The stylish stand comes with a wave base pattern which really accentuates the overall look of your workspace. Keep your setup clean with the in-built cable management and place your phone within easy reach on the built-in phone stand. Access all of the monitor’s settings with ease using Lenovo’s Artery Software3. Do your bit for the environment by choosing a monitor that’s made with 85% recycled resin. The Lenovo L22i-40 Monitor is a great companion when it comes to getting work done with ease.
